Topic.Title: Unable To Change Title In "My Games"

Posts.EditableText: I am writing a short text-adventure _Phantom Library_. This is my first game using Quest, so I just called it _Quest_ to start with, because I did not know where the game would lead. At the point where I figured out where it was going, I changed the "Game name" field in the "Setup" section of "game" to the title that I wanted. I published the game a bit later at http://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/fktcx7i15e64w9t-qqvjbw/phantom-library and the title worked, but in my list of text adventures it still listed the title as _Quest_. http://textadventures.co.uk/create. Did I do anything wrong, or is this normal?
Posts.HTML: I am writing a short text-adventure Phantom Library. This is my first game using Quest, so I just called it Quest to start with, because I did not know where the game would lead. At the point where I figured out where it was going, I changed the "Game name" field in the "Setup" section of "game" to the title that I wanted. I published the game a bit later at http://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/fktcx7i15e64w9t-qqvjbw/phantom-library and the title worked, but in my list of text adventures it still listed the title as Quest. http://textadventures.co.uk/create. Did I do anything wrong, or is this normal?

Posts.EditableText:
There may be an update timing delay...
I updated my game and everything updated correctly...
(the next day, I think...)
Posts.HTML:
There may be an update timing delay...
I updated my game and everything updated correctly...

Posts.EditableText:
did you publish it under Quest or Phantom-library?
I ask because the download file is called Quest.zip...
Posts.HTML:
did you publish it under Quest or Phantom-library?
I ask because the download file is called Quest.zip...

Posts.EditableText: I think the web site only extracts the data from your game when you first upload it. If you upload a new version the original data is kept. However, you can edit it all via the web site. Just click on "Edit listing".
Posts.HTML: I think the web site only extracts the data from your game when you first upload it. If you upload a new version the original data is kept. However, you can edit it all via the web site. Just click on "Edit listing".

Posts.EditableText: Okay thanks. Still says "Quest" in my personal section though... I'll poke around and see  what I can find. Yes, I did publish it under Phantom Library.
Posts.HTML: Okay thanks. Still says "Quest" in my personal section though... I'll poke around and see what I can find. Yes, I did publish it under Phantom Library.

Posts.EditableText: The game details has Phantom Library written.
Posts.HTML: The game details has Phantom Library written.
